abstract: Adds an action to perform when the user squeezes their Apple Pencil.

declaration.code: nonisolated func onPencilSqueeze(perform action: @escaping (PencilSqueezeGesturePhase) -> Void) -> some View

overview:
## Return Value

A view that performs `action` when the user squeezes their Apple Pencil.

## Discussion

You should respect people’s setting for the squeeze gesture by reading the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/preferredPencilSqueezeAction] environment value, if the setting makes sense in your app. If it doesn’t, consider giving people a way to specify custom behavior in your app instead.
